actionTemplate.title: Flat Straight Brow
steps: Keep the brow close to a horizontal line with a flatter tail
Sketch a straight lower edge and extend the tail slightly
Lay color with powder, then add hair-like strokes with pencil
Brush to blend and clean the lower edge with concealer

rationaleTemplate: Easy, everyday-friendly, and works well for soft makeup looks.
A flatter line reads calm and less aggressive.
